metadata.title: Tuesday, 23rd February, 2016
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Vice President and Minister of Development Planning
parts: (a)    whether Timor Consulting, an Israeli-based company is registered in Zambia;
(b)    whether the company has any role to play in the 2016 General Elections;
(c)    if so, what the role is; and
(d)    whether the stakeholders in the forth-coming elections have been advised about the presence of Timor Consulting.

questions.minister: Minister of General Education when Ncheka Primary School in Malambo Parliamentary Constituency, whose roof was blown off more than two (2) years ago, will be rehabilitated.
parts: (a)    how many varieties of the following indigenous (non-hybrid) types of seed are bred and stocked by the Government to ensure they do not get extinct:
(b)    which varieties at (a) are commonly grown in Zambia; and
(c)    which varieties at (a) have export quality potential.
